entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to AD review
  • Assignee changed from David Meredith to Andre Merzky
  • Priority changed from Normal to High

I take this on for initial AD review.

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to initial review
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby
  • Start date changed from 03/25/2013 to 04/01/2013

Looks good to me, and ready for GFSG initial review. Allan, Greg, can we put it on the agenda for the next call?

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
Confirmed, this is ready for the next standards council telecon. After that, public comment.
    -- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

create markup-free pdf, and put schema online, apply new boiler plate, then sync with GFSG, then to public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
This is approved for 60-day (proposed recommendation) public comment. Andre will push it to OGF.org and I will announce. Andre will accept the tracked changes in Word prior to doing that. The template from section 7 on needs to be replaced with the latest version, prior to public comment.

    We would like to go ahead and make the schema available at schemas.ogf.org, co-incident with public comment. Andre can help with this, too.

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema

schema is at http://www.ogf.org/schemas/glue/2013/04/spec_2.0_r1.
pdf and revised doc is attached. Will push to public comment as indicated by Greg.

Is now in public comment until July 20th

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Via email from JP, they are proceeding with addressing the public comments. A final version is expected shortly after OGF39.

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to final review
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

All comments have been tended to, per email from the authors. The proposed final document is here:
https://redmine.ogf.org/dmsf/glue-wg?folder_id=6565

This is now in final GFSG review prior to publication.
-- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #70: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realization to XML Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Thanks for this updated document, which the standards council has approved for publication. This will be GFD-R-P.209. Andre, would you please prepare the final file?
-- Greg

entry.content: The document is published on http://www.ogf.org/dokuwiki/doku.php/documents/documents, and can be announced.
